title: Cognizant gets HC relief in Rs 9,403 crore dividend distribution tax case
description: The bench said that in the event of default on the part of the company in complying with the conditions, the order shall stand vacated automatically, without any further reference to the court.
content: Madras High Court has stayed the tax demand of Rs 9,403.09 crore against tech giant Cognizant Technology in case of its share buy buyback of Rs 19,000 crore, subject to payment of Rs 1,500 crore.
